mapper.select: select aptcode, orgapt, house_no, head_of_household, same_address, have_car, house_owner, apt_name, apt_dong, apt_ho, moving_in_date, residence_from, residence_to, owner_name, owner_address, owner_phone, api, version, description from residents where aptcode = #{aptcode} and house_no = #{house_no}
mapper.insert: insert into residents ( aptcode, orgapt, house_no, head_of_household, same_address, have_car, house_owner, apt_name, apt_dong, apt_ho, moving_in_date, residence_from, residence_to, owner_name, owner_address, owner_phone, api, version, description ) values ( '${aptcode}', '${orgapt}', '${house_no}', '${head_of_household}', '${same_address}', '${have_car}', '${house_owner}', '${apt_name}', '${apt_dong}', '${apt_ho}', '${moving_in_date}', '${residence_from}', '${residence_to}', '${owner_name}', '${owner_address}', '${owner_phone}', '${api}', '${version}', '${description}' )

insert into composition ( index, aptcode, orgapt, house_no, household_type, household_owner, household_name, household_birthday, household_phone ) values
( #{composition.index}, #{aptcode}, #{orgapt}, #{house_no}, #{composition.household_type}, #{composition.household_owner}, #{composition.household_name}, #{composition.household_birthday}, #{composition.household_phone} )

insert into cars ( index, aptcode, orgapt, house_no, owner_name, car_type, car_no, electric_car ) values
( #{car.index}, #{aptcode}, #{orgapt}, #{house_no}, #{car.owner_name}, #{car.car_type}, #{car.car_no}, #{car.electric_car} )
